name: Update product with invalid ID
descriptionHtml:
Request:

PUT - http://localhost/products

raw 
  {
    "id": ,
    "name": "banana",
    "price": 155,
    "sku": 123321123,
    "description": "changed description"
}

Response:

400 - Bad Request 

  



Error



SyntaxError: Unexpected token , in JSON at position 13
    at JSON.parse (<anonymous>)
    at parse (/home/runner/work/Postman-newman-allure/Postman-newman-allure/node_modules/body-parser/lib/types/json.js:89:19)
    at /home/runner/work/Postman-newman-allure/Postman-newman-allure/node_modules/body-parser/lib/read.js:128:18
    at AsyncResource.runInAsyncScope (node:async_hooks:203:9)
    at invokeCallback (/home/runner/work/Postman-newman-allure/Postman-newman-allure/node_modules/raw-body/index.js:231:16)
    at done (/home/runner/work/Postman-newman-allure/Postman-newman-allure/node_modules/raw-body/index.js:220:7)
    at IncomingMessage.onEnd (/home/runner/work/Postman-newman-allure/Postman-newman-allure/node_modules/raw-body/index.js:280:7)
    at IncomingMessage.emit (node:events:525:35)
    at endReadableNT (node:internal/streams/readable:1358:12)
    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:83:21)
statusMessage: Status code is 404, Error message is displayed
